col0: Genre which is: A planned, creative, rendition of discourse involving two or more participants.

col1: A planned, creative, rendition of discourse involving two or more participants.
col6: Uma versão planejada, criativa do discurso, envolvendo dois ou mais participantes.

col0: Genre which is: A ritually or conventionally structured discourse.

col1: A ritually or conventionally structured discourse.
col6: Um discurso estruturado ritualmente ou convencionalmente.

col0: Genre which is: Linguistic communication between two or more participants.

col1: Linguistic communication between two or more participants.
col6: Comunicação linguística entre dois ou mais participantes.

col0: Genre which is: A language whose primary function is to be part of play, or a style of speech that involves a creative manipulation of the structures of the language.

col1: A language whose primary function is to be part of play, or a style of speech that involves a creative manipulation of the structures of the language.

col0: Genre which is: Public speaking, or speaking eloquently according to rules or conventions.

col1: Public speaking, or speaking eloquently according to rules or conventions.
col6: Falar em público ou falar eloquentemente de acordo com regras ou convenções.

col0: Genre which is: A monologic discourse which represents temporally organized events.

col1: A monologic discourse which represents temporally organized events.
col6: Um discurso monológico que representa eventos temporalmente organizados.

col0: Genre which is: An explanation or description of a method, process, or situation having ordered steps.

col1: An explanation or description of a method, process, or situation having ordered steps.
col6: Uma explicação ou descrição de um método, processo ou situação que demanda etapas.

col0: Genre which is: A factual account of some event or circumstance.

col1: A factual account of some event or circumstance.
col6: Um relato factual de algum evento ou circunstância.

col0: Genre which is: Words or sounds articulated in succession with musical inflections or modulations of the voice.

col1: Words or sounds articulated in succession with musical inflections or modulations of the voice.
col6: Palavras ou sons articulados em sucessão com inflexões ou modulações musicais da voz.

col0: Genre which is: Music intended to be performed by a musical instrument or group of instruments.

col1: Music intended to be performed by a musical instrument or group of instruments.
col6: Música destinada a ser tocada por um instrumento musical ou um grupo de instrumentos.

col0: Genre which is: Utterances that are not intended to be interpretable as ordinary language.

col1: Utterances that are not intended to be interpretable as ordinary language.
col6: Declarações que não pretendem ser interpretáveis ​​como linguagem comum.
